name: Space Katz
description:
Goal: Reach a score of 40,000 with out getting hit once. Fly through loops a total of 5 times in order to reach max power up!

EPIC MEGA JAM SUBMISSION INFO:

Premade assets-

Music = Infinity Tone Metal Pack 3 

Sound FX = Retro 8Bit Sounds Pack

Font = classc fonts pack (Game Dev Market Place)

Key Board Controls:

Move = W, A, S, D

Shoot = Space Bar, Left Mouse button

Xbox/PS4 Controls:

Move = Left Analog Stick

Shoot = A(Xbox), X(PS4)

Known Issues:

Power up collisions sometimes will not work.
